setting.blueprint.desc_local_upload: Please ensure that the uploaded file content complies with Beaver IoT's required parsing format.
setting.blueprint.desc_official_store: Automatically update when a new version is available; updates take no longer than 3 minutes.
setting.blueprint.message_sync_failed: Update failed. Please check if the blueprint repository is available.
setting.blueprint.official_store_helper_: By default, the source checks the Beaver IoT official repository every three hours for the latest available version and automatically updates if one is found. Click the [Edit] button on the right to switch to manual upload.
setting.integration.add.application_tip: Select the ID of the application you just created in the gateway below.
setting.integration.add.credential_tip: Please create an application in the Web GUI of the gateway (Network Server - Application) and paste the generated information below into it.
setting.integration.ai_bind_delete_tip: Do you want to delete the model bound to the device? After deletion, subsequent device data updates will no longer request model services, and historical data will remain unaffected。
setting.integration.ai_infer_load_image_: Image loading error, please check and try again.
setting.integration.ai_model_bind_device:
Select the device and entity on the left,
and the image preview will be displayed here
setting.integration.ai_model_param_input:
Enter the parameters on the left,
and the preview of the inference result will be displayed here
setting.integration.ai_update_model_desc: Refresh the current model inference service
setting.integration.ai_update_model_tip: Are you sure you want to synchronize the model list? After confirming, you can refresh the current model inference service.
setting.integration.available_function_w: When using the following features, make sure that the OpenAPI connection is in ready state.
setting.integration.bulk_del_template_de: Are you sure you want to delete this device template? This action will also delete the associated devices and all their data!
setting.integration.codec.customize_tip: Please enter the Codec file address used for coding and decoding the device data.
setting.integration.del_template_desc: Are you sure you want to delete this device template? This operation will simultaneously delete the associated device and all its data!
setting.integration.device.sync_tip: This will reset the Payload Codec of the node device (used in gateway) to empty. Please Proceed with caution.
setting.integration.device.update_codec_: Used to obtain the latest product codec from the specified acquired address. Note: The new codec is only valid for newly added devices.
setting.integration.function_data_sync_c: Confirm or not to perform this operation. synchronization will only add non-existing devices and will not update the information of existing devices.
setting.integration.function_data_sync_d: This service will pull all device information from the Milesight Development Platform that is bound to a connected application and telemetry data reported by devices.
setting.integration.gateway.delete_bulk_: Deleting a gateway will also delete the node devices under the gateway. Are you sure you want to delete this {1} gateway and the node devices under it?
setting.integration.gateway.delete_tip: Deleting a gateway will also delete the node devices under it. Are you sure you want to delete the gateway and the node devices under it?
setting.integration.label.device_bulk_de: Are you sure you want to delete these {1} devices in batches?
setting.integration.label.device_delete_: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
setting.integration.message.sync_device_: Is it confirmed to execute the operation of synchronizing the device?
setting.integration.mqtt_broker_helper_t: Configure the MQTT connection information provided below in the device to complete the connection between the device and the platform.
setting.integration.openapi_config_helpe: API Key is used to authenticate with the server.
setting.integration.openapi_helper_text: Proactively pull device information and device telemetry data at regular intervals via OpenAPI.
setting.integration.simulated_data_repor:
Enter the original data on the left
The simulation report result preview will be displayed here
setting.integration.sync_device_empty_mo: Please fill in the required information completely
setting.integration.webhook_helper_text: Receive the data pushed by Milesight Development Platform in real time via the Webhook service, and paste the URL address generated below, into the application from Milesight Development Platform.
